_header: I am a worm and no man
Subjects: sermons, verse in; scripture texts, Engl. trans. of
_description: A couplet in a Latin sermon, translating Psalm 22:6

OxfBal149.Transcription: Y am a worme & no manout castynge of alle men

CULKk424.Transcription: y am a worm & no manowt castyng of al men
CULKk424.Note:
In a sermon for dominica in passione vel in die parasceue on
                        Amore langueo(possibly by John Bromyard).

TCD277.Transcription:
I am a worm & noght a manschame & owte castyng of
                    men
TCD277.Note:
In a sermo de passione Cristi in die parasceues facienda (p.
                    185).
